vclaim: 12 Republican House members voted against awarding the Congressional Gold Medal to the U.S. Capitol Police for their actions during the Jan. 6, 2021 attack on the Capitol.
title: Did 12 GOP House Members Vote Against Medals for Capitol Police?
subtitle: The votes of 12 Republican House members in March 2021 caused widespread outrage, but there was more to the story.
author: Dan MacGuill
